z:row.Col3: For CTEP sponsored trials, remove Expedited AE Flow -> Describe Event -> Details
z:row.Col11: Core Development (Middle Layer and BackEnd Module 1: Adverse Event Data Capture Module 4: External Agency Reporting User Interface
z:row.Col14: 10088_Event Details to remove for CTEP sponsored trials.jpg
z:row.Col16: The details section of the "Describe Event" tab in the Expedited AE flow, should be removed for CTEP sponsored trials. Alternatively, this section could be just added for DCP sponsored trials. See the attached screenshot.

z:row.Col3: Changes to "Submit Report" screen.
z:row.Col16:
NCI has requested that the url for submitting a report be hidden or "beautified" within the user interface. Either hiding the url or providing a synonym, such as "AdEERS staging system" would be satisfactory.
Additionally, the header should be renamed f
